name: Orion Sandbox Enhanced
description: This is a 2D crafting survival sandbox game. You will be able to explore a huge 2D side-view world, building houses, crafting tools, weapons and armour from the resources you collect. There is a day/night cycle and each night many dangerous monsters can be found and defeated.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: intel core i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: minimal requirements DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: intel core i5 or equivalent Graphics: nVidia 7xx or Radeon equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: required
